overview.en: EEC uses the traceability feature of the blockchain as an endorsement of credit by implanting a recognition chip into the product and registering it on the blockchain to have a digital identity, preventing duplicate manufacturing and ensuring identity uniqueness.
overview.zh: EEC使用区块链的可追溯特征作为信用的背书，通过给产品植入识别芯片，并注册到区块链上，使其拥有一个数字身份，防止复制造假，确保身份标识唯一性。
